terms.header: RULES OF USE FOR THE ,,PARKUOK.LT” APP

points.point11: 1.1 The rules of use for the ,,Parkuok.lt” app (hereinafter – the Rules) set out the procedure for using the ,,Parkuok.lt” app (hereinafter – Parkuok.lt).
points.point12: 1.2 The ,,Parkuok.lt” app can be used in specified cities according to a list of private parking lots where there is information marked about the possibility to pay using the Parkuok.lt app.
points.point13: 1.3 The user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app confirms that by using the ,,Parkuok.lt” app, they have familiarized themselves with these Rules, agrees with the conditions specified in them and undertakes to adhere to them.
points.point14: 1.4 The Rules are approved and changed by the director of the company Kitoks miestas, UAB. The rules can be unilaterally changed at any time, taking into account the requirements set by legal acts, changes in software functionality, or other unforeseen circumstances that may affect the functioning of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app, notifying about the changes in the ,,Parkuok.lt” app. The changes to the Rules take effect from the day they are published. If the user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app continues to use the ,,Parkuok.lt” app after the publication of the changes to the Rules, it is considered that they agree with all the changes to the Rules.
points.point15: 1.5 Using the ,,Parkuok.lt” app, you can pay for the use of parking lots at set rates in cities where it is installed as a payment method for parking, valid in private parking lot areas.
points.point16: 1.6 Internet connection is required for the ,,Parkuok.lt” app to function on the user's mobile phone.
points.point17: 1.7 The developer and manager of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app is the company Kitoks miestas, UAB (address: Savanorių pr., 123 Vilnius, company code: 303118462, tel., +37061022229 email: pagalba@citypro.lt, www.citypro.lt) (hereinafter – the Company).
points.point18: 1.8 The ,,Parkuok.lt” app is the property of the Company. The user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app or any other party may not change, copy, distribute or otherwise use the data in the ,,Parkuok.lt” app. All rights to the ,,Parkuok.lt” app and the works contained in it are protected. No content or information in the ,,Parkuok.lt” app can be reproduced in any form, made publicly available, distributed and/or otherwise used. All trademarks presented in the ,,Parkuok.lt” app are the property of the Company or the Company uses them legally.
points.point19: 1.9 The Company has the right at its discretion without prior notice:
points.point191: 1.9.1 to prohibit the user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app from using the ,,Parkuok.lt” app for an indefinite period;
points.point192: 1.9.2 to change the design of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app or other information used.

secondParagraph.heading: 2. INFORMATION ABOUT THE USER OF THE ,,PARKUOK.LT” APP
points: 2.1 For payment purposes, the Company collects and otherwise processes these data (including personal data) with the consent of the user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app:
2.1.1 vehicle registration number;
2.1.2 amount of payment;
2.1.3 period of payment;
2.1.4 vehicle parking location;
2.1.5 user's phone number;
2.1.6 user's email address;
2.1.7 user's name and surname;
2.2 The user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app is responsible for the accuracy of the provided data.

2.3 The data collected in the ,,Parkuok.lt” app is stored in a format and for terms that allow it to be used no longer than necessary for the purposes for which these data were collected and processed.

2.4 If the user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app does not want their personal data to be collected and processed, they must delete all the ,,Parkuok.lt” app usage history from their mobile phone. It is also possible to pay in other ways specified in the parking lot rules.

2.5 The user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app has the right to ask the data controller to allow them to access the user's personal data of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app and correct or delete them, or limit data processing.
2.6 Personal data collected in the ,,Parkuok.lt” app is processed in accordance with the European Union and Republic of Lithuania legal acts and Company rules.

thirdParagraph.heading: 3. LIABILITY OF THE PARTIES
points: 3.1 The user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app assumes all responsibility for using the ,,Parkuok.lt” app.

3.2 The Company, its representatives, and partners are not liable for any damage that the user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app may suffer due to the use of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app. The Company does not take responsibility for improperly performed actions of the user of the ,,Parkuok.lt” app, the operation of the telephone equipment used, communication failures, or other obstacles.

forthParagraph.heading: 4. PAYMENT AND REFUND POLICY
points: 4.1 By using the Parkuok.lt app, you agree to pay the Fee for the chosen service. Prices, payment order, and other information are indicated in the parking lot rules.
4.2 You ensure that when paying with the Parkuok.lt app, there will be a sufficient balance in the account.
4.3 Use of the Parkuok.lt app is also a unilateral and irrevocable agreement between Parkuok.lt and the Client.

4.4 Client's instructions for carrying out Payment operations and other actions, performed and confirmed in the established order, have the same legal force as written documents confirmed by a signature, and can be used as evidence in court or other institutions or establishments.
4.5 By using the ,,Parkuok.lt” app, you are responsible for correct input of the vehicle's registration number and other selected data.
